title: The Kinda Funny Crew Brings The Chaos To Halo Big Team Battle!
description:
Nothing is better than playing games with your friends and NOTHING is better than playing Halo Big Team Battle with the Kinda Funny Crew. We have assembled the whole team to come and play BTB on this Friday stream and we're playing for a great cause while raising money for The Breast Cancer Research Foundation.

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny
